metadata.title: Frownies Skin Serum roller
features: Addressing exposure to UV rays that cause redness (erythema) and leathery skin
Vitamin E is a proven anti-oxidant that promotes healing and protects skin from scaring
When looking for topical vitamin E serum no other vitamin E product has this high percentage of active whole vitamin E as Immune Shield
description: IMPROVED FORMULA Immune Shield was created as an after sun care to keep skin looking younger and for over exposure to UV rays. UV rays cause oxidation on and in the skin leaving the skin looking aged and damaged. Immune Shield can also be useful for all skin types. Be sure to read our ingredient page for detailed information on new whole plant based ingredient benefits. Oat oil and vitamin E in its whole from help to provide soft skin. Keeping it looking younger and more even.

title: Quick, easy and painless. Frownies anti-wrinkle patches
